Noj Notrub:
Name: Noj Notrub
Race: Dragonborn
Class: Bard
Background: Entertainer
Alignment: Chaotic Good

Ability Scores:
STR: 9
DEX: 10
CON: 12
INT: 14
WIS: 14
CHA: 14

HP: 30
AC: 10

Personality: Noj the Dragonborn stands at 6'4" with vibrant blue scales that shimmer like the deep ocean. His draconic features are softened by kind, light green eyes. He often wears simple, travel-worn clothes, favoring practicality over ostentation. A well-loved lute is always strapped to his back, and a pouch of seasoned beef jerky hangs from his belt.

Equipment:
- Small Dagger in Right Boot
- Basic Blue Clothing with Leather Padding
- Satchel
- Lute
- Beef Jerky
- Waterskin

Backstory: Noj was born in a remote mountain village. He loved two things: his lute and beef jerky. While his clan crafted wind instruments, Noj was drawn to the lute, taught to him by a traveling bard. His love for beef jerky began with a human trapper who shared his запасы (supplies). Yearning to explore beyond his village and share his music (and sample all the beef jerky the world has to offer), Noj left home. He now wanders the land, playing his lute and searching for the perfect piece of dried meat.
Quarion Xiloscient:
Name: Quarion Xiloscient
Race: Elf
Class: Wizard
Level: 5

Ability Scores:
STR: 12
DEX: 14
CON: 16
INT: 18
WIS: 10
CHA: 13

HP: 27
AC: 14

Background: Sage
Alignment: Neutral Good

Personality:
Curious, studious, and cautious.

Equipment:
- Wand of the War Mage
- Robe of the Archmagi
- Spellbook, magnifying glass, ink pen

Backstory:
Quarion was born into a family of scholars. He dedicated his life to mastering arcane knowledge. His research led him to uncover ancient secrets, which he now uses to protect his homeland.
Berrian Windwalker:
Name: Berrian Windwalker
Race: Half-Elf
Class: Ranger
Level: 5

Ability Scores:
STR: 14
DEX: 16
CON: 13
INT: 10
WIS: 15
CHA: 12

HP: 38 (13 (CON) x 3 (class bonus for ranger) + 3 (level) x 2 (class progression for ranger) = 38
AC: 16 (10 + 3 (DEX mod) + 3 (shield))

Background: Outlander
Alignment: Chaotic Good

Personality:
- Adventurous
- Loyal to allies
- Disdains authority

Equipment:
- Longbow
- Leather armor
- Thieves' tools
- Short sword

Backstory:
Berrian Windwalker was born in the borderlands between the Elven forest and human kingdoms. His human mother died when he was young, and he was raised by his elven father, who taught him the ways of the ranger. Berrian grew up roaming the wilderness, honing his tracking and archery skills. He joined a group of outlanders who shared his views and now seeks adventure and a chance to make a difference in the world.
Akra Shestendeliath:
Name: Akra Shestendeliath
Race: Dragonborn
Class: Paladin
Level: 5

Ability Scores:
STR: 16
DEX: 12
CON: 14
INT: 10
WIS: 13
CHA: 15

HP: 45
AC: 19

Background: Soldier
Alignment: Lawful Good

Personality:
Dutiful, protective, compassionate

Equipment:
- Longsword
- Plate armor
- Shield, signet ring, holy symbol of Bahamut

Backstory:
Akra was born into a noble dragonborn family and was trained from a young age in the ways of combat and chivalry. She became a paladin of Bahamut, dedicating her life to protecting the innocent and vanquishing evil. Akra served in the army of a human kingdom for several years, earning a reputation as a brave and skilled warrior. She now travels the land, seeking to defend the weak and uphold justice.
